attributes.title: The worst app
attributes.review: When i opened the app, i put in my number and next thing i know i was spammed with texts and calls! Trump also came into my house and stole my cheese later in the day and went away in his maga helicopter😭worst experience.

attributes.title: ONE STAR
attributes.review: This is one of the most CONFUSING apps I’ve ever had to use!! Not to mention, right when you open the app, there’s a picture of my beloved president, Donald trump, holding up the “black lives matter” fist!! ALL LIVES MATTER DONALD! Don’t get me wrong, I love my president, but this is just absurd😡

attributes.title: this app caused severe brain damage
attributes.review:
when downloading this app, i was very excited. finally i could support our young and beautiful president. 
finally i felt that i could get trusty information from my phone. because fox news mobile is a bit hard to use. 
i am very sad to say that as soon as i opened to app the obnoxious words and colors caused my brain to react in a horrific way. causing severe brain damage. 
i caution anyone who is looking to download this app.

attributes.title: Terrible!
attributes.review: I’ve been MAGA since day one! but this app is a DISGRACE. Whatever you do, don’t get this!!! One hour after downloading, my phone started to glitch and slow down. It’ll eat your data and shut it down. Do not download!!!

attributes.title: This app literally gives me nightmares
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and opened it to find a very disgusting video on how to massage your dog's anal glands. Honestly I do not think I can ever be able to forget this experience and overall I give it one star.

attributes.title: YUCK
attributes.review: I hate this app I thought I was going to log and enjoy me experience but no, I logged on and trumps name was in my face I wish for no one to ever use this app I can’t believe Apple would even allow an app like this on here , I’m disappointed. 😞

attributes.title: Terrible app all around 0/10
attributes.review: This app was a waste of space in my phone. I wish I could take back the energy it took to download this and write this review. I don’t understand why this is even on the App Store.

attributes.title: I’m disappointed
attributes.review: 🧚🏻🎁🎁🎁🧸🎁🧸Any one 🧚🏻that supports trump is a idiot. The man is a rapist, child molester , racist and supports🧚🏻‍♀️ white supremacy.🧚🏻 He’s one of the worst presidents in American 🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️history. The only way you can support him is if you have the mind of a peanut. Over all the❤️ app was a joke. 🧚🏻‍♂️❤️❤️🔅🔅🔆🔆🎁🎀

attributes.title: Don’t even
attributes.review: When trump said he was a jenius I just had to see what the fuss was about. Turns out I was wrong. This app was a waste of a download and worst of all, wasn’t from a jenius. I could get better info from Fox News if I really wanted to.

attributes.title: Bunker Boy
attributes.review: the app was absolutely terrible!!!! I was hoping to learn all the wonderful things that trump has done like assault women/children, his white separatist self, and so many other fun things but not one of those things seem to come up so 0/10 app :)))
